settings.about_page: Oriana Tundo, a Swiss native with italian-indian roots, is an Artist working in Jewelry and Objects. After operating as a freelance Designer she launched her eponymous brand TUNDO in 2022. The first collection is a series of repurposed Jewelry fetched all over the world, put together in a new way with functional pieces and chains, showing post consumed Jewelry in a new wearable way. Her background as a Chemistry Assistant and the Swiss metal industry takes a big influence throughout her work - Galvanized metal mixes with once-owned achievements and questions the decadence of mass consumption. By creating limited collections, TUNDO remains on the pulse of the times , keeping up with the constant rapid change in fashion, without loosing the identity. Every piece is handmade and unique.
